description: An object describing the vessels sails if the vessel is a sailboat.
title: sails

available.description: An object containing a description of each sail available to the vessel crew

(^[a-zA-Z0-9]$).description: Each sail is identified by a unique name, containing only alphanumeric characters.

area.description: An object containing information about the area of the sails.

total.description: The total area of all sails on the vessel, measured in square meters.

active.description: The total area of the sails currently in use on the vessel, measured in square meters.
